languages.text: {n}Все внутри вас вопит от ужаса, а тело сотрясается от боли при попытке содрать устройство. Участок кожи, которого коснулась брошь, горит так, будто там взорвался миниатюрный мельта-заряд — и все же вам удается оторвать ксенотворение от своей плоти.{/n}

{n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все внутри вас вопит от ужаса, а тело сотрясается от боли при попытке содрать устройство. Участок кожи, которого коснулась брошь, горит так, будто там взорвался миниатюрный мельта-заряд — и все же вам удается оторвать ксенотворение от своей плоти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin where the brooch touched it burns like it had been grazed by a miniature melta charge, and yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

{n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin where the brooch touched it burns like it had been grazed by a miniature melta charge, and yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

{n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

{n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

{n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你体内的一切都在恐惧中放声尖叫。当你试图扯下这件造物时，你感觉整个身体都在痛苦中颤抖。被造物触碰到的皮肤区域灼烧起来，就好像被微型热熔炸弹炸了一样。但到了最后，你还是成功地将这件异形造物从你的身上扯了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你体内的一切都在恐惧中放声尖叫。当你试图扯下这件造物时，你感觉整个身体都在痛苦中颤抖。被造物触碰到的皮肤区域灼烧起来，就好像被微型热熔炸弹炸了一样。但到了最后，你还是成功地将这件异形造物从你的身上扯了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの中の全てが恐怖に叫び、デバイスを引き剥がそうとすると身体は痛みに震える。ブローチが触れた箇所の皮膚はミニチュアのメルタチャージに擦られたかのように焼けついているが、なんとかそのゼノの創造品を自らの肉から剥がすことに成功した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの中の全てが恐怖に叫び、デバイスを引き剥がそうとすると身体は痛みに震える。ブローチが触れた箇所の皮膚はミニチュアのメルタチャージに擦られたかのように焼けついているが、なんとかそのゼノの創造品を自らの肉から剥がすことに成功した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tout votre être hurle de terreur et votre corps se tord de douleur tandis que vous essayez d'arracher l'appareil. La zone de peau touchée par la broche vous brûle comme si elle avait été frôlée par une charge à fusion miniature, mais vous parvenez à arracher la création xénos de votre chair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout votre être hurle de terreur et votre corps se tord de douleur tandis que vous essayez d'arracher l'appareil. La zone de peau touchée par la broche vous brûle comme si elle avait été frôlée par une charge à fusion miniature, mais vous parvenez à arracher la création xénos de votre chair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sientes el terror invadiéndote, y tu cuerpo tiembla de dolor al intentar arrancarte el dispositivo. La zona de tu piel que ha tocado el broche te quema como si la hubiese rozado una carga de fusión en miniatura, pero logras arrancarte el artefacto xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes el terror invadiéndote, y tu cuerpo tiembla de dolor al intentar arrancarte el dispositivo. La zona de tu piel que ha tocado el broche te quema como si la hubiese rozado una carga de fusión en miniatura, pero logras arrancarte el artefacto xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alles in dir schreit vor Terror, und dein Körper zittert vor Schmerz, als du versuchst, das Gerät abzureißen. Der Hautbereich, auf dem die Brosche liegt, fühlt sich an wie nach einer Miniatur-Melterladung, aber es gelingt dir dennoch, die Xenos-Schöpfung von deinem Fleisch zu reißen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything inside you screams in terror, and your body shakes in pain as you try to rip off the device. The area of skin touched by the brooch burns as if it has been grazed by a miniature melta charge, yet you manage to tear the xenos creation from your flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alles in dir schreit vor Terror, und dein Körper zittert vor Schmerz, als du versuchst, das Gerät abzureißen. Der Hautbereich, auf dem die Brosche liegt, fühlt sich an wie nach einer Miniatur-Melterladung, aber es gelingt dir dennoch, die Xenos-Schöpfung von deinem Fleisch zu reißen.{/n}
